text: Central American and Caribbean youth bests in the sport of athletics are the all-time best marks set in competition by aged 17 or younger throughout the entire calendar year of the performance and competing for a member nation of the Central American and Caribbean Athletic Confederation (CACAC). CACAC doesn't maintain an official list for such performances. All bests shown on this list are tracked by statisticians not officially sanctioned by the governing body. ==Outdoor== ===Boys=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Athlete !Nationality !Date !Meet !Place !Age !Ref |- |100 m |10.20 (+2.0 m/s) |Sachin Dennis | |24 March 2018 |ISSA/GraceKennedy Championships | Kingston, Jamaica | | |- |200 m |20.13 (0.0 m/s) |Usain Bolt | |20 July 2003 |Pan American Junior Championships | Bridgetown, Barbados | | |- |400 m | | | | | | | | |- |800 m | | | | | | | | |- |1500 m | | | | | | | | |- |Mile | | | | | | | | |- |3000 m | | | | | | | | |- |5000 m | | | | | | | | |- |10000 m | | | | | | | | |- |110 m hurdles (91.4 cm) |12.96 (+1.3 m/s) |Jaheel Hyde | |23 August 2014 |Youth Olympic Games | Nanjing, China | | |- |110 m hurdles (99/100 cm) | | | | | | | | |- |110 m hurdles |13.32 (+0.7 m/s) |Dejour Russell | |24 June 2017 |Jamaican Championships | Kingston, Jamaica | | |- |300 m hurdles (91.4 cm) | | | | | | | | |- |400 m hurdles (84.0 cm) | | | | | | | | |- |400 m hurdles (91.4 cm) | | | | | | | | |- |2000 m steeplechase | | | | | | | | |- |3000 m steeplechase | | | | | | | | |- |High jump |2.33 m |Javier Sotomayor | |19 May 1984 | |Havana, Cuba | | |- |Pole vault | | | | | | | | |- |Long jump |8.28 m (+1.8 m/s) |Maykel Demetrio Massó | |28 May 2016 |Memorial Barrientos | Havana, Cuba | | |- |Triple jump |17.41 m (+1.0 m/s) |Jordan A.
